name: Scrap Wyvern
desc:
2 monsters, including a "Scrap" monster
You can target 1 "Scrap" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, then destroy 1 card you control. If a face-up "Scrap" monster(s) on the field is destroyed by a card effect while this monster is on the field: You can Special Summon 1 "Scrap" monster from your Deck, then destroy 1 card on the field. You can only use each effect of "Scrap Wyvern" once per turn.
str1: Special Summon 1 Scrap monster and destroy 1 card
